docs.text: Welcome to Microlib.org What is a microlib? Microlib definition A python package is called a microlib, if all of the following are true: The library exposes not more than 5 public classes or functions The library has 100% test coverage The library has 100% third-party dependency cohesion Has at least one clearly-defined use case per definition
